settings.title: Settings

coreTraining.title: Core Training
coreTraining.sessionLengthError: Session length must be at least {{minLength}} for N-Level {{nLevel}}.

dataManagement.title: Data Management
dataManagement.resetConfirmation: Are you sure you want to reset all data? This will delete all your history and restore default settings. This action cannot be undone.

settings.unsavedChanges: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?

history.title: History & Progress
history.noHistory: No history yet. Play a game to see your progress!

historyDetail.title: Session Details for {{date}}
historyDetail.error: An error occurred while loading session details.
historyDetail.noData: No data available for this session.
historyDetail.postGamePrompt: This is a game that just ended. You can review it at any time on the <0>History</0> page.
historyDetail.playAgainSameSettings: Play again with the same settings

game.title: Dual N-Back
game.quitConfirmation: You are in the middle of a game. To avoid losing progress, please use the 'Pause' button on the game screen. Do you still want to quit and leave this page?
game.historyPrompt: You can view all data in the <0>{{historyLink}}</0> page
game.increaseDifficultyPrompt: Great job! It's time to challenge yourself with a higher N-Back level.
game.decreaseDifficultyPrompt: Keep practicing! We suggest trying a lower N-Back level to solidify your skills.
game.disableSuggestionInSettings: You can disable this prompt in the settings.
